医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
植物性饮食、地中海饮食和西方饮食如何影响肠道微生物群和疾病研究人员研究了不同的饮食成分如何影响肠道微生物组和非传染性疾病的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/How-plant-based-Mediterranean-and-Western-diets-affect-gut-microbiota-and-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/How-plant-based-Mediterranean-and-Western-diets-affect-gut-microbiota-and-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3b841a2-5465-42d3-ba8e-36b68b365219 Fri, 20 Sep 2024 11:22:00 -0400 How plant-based, Mediterranean, and Western diets affect gut microbiota and disease
童年逆境与健康风险升高有关，因性别和压力而异研究人员评估了童年逆境对成年后疾病生物标志物和健康状况的异质影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/Childhood-adversity-linked-to-elevated-health-risks-differing-by-sex-and-stress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/Childhood-adversity-linked-to-elevated-health-risks-differing-by-sex-and-stress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4725e6aa-fd78-43f9-b859-d4739c2cf619 Fri, 20 Sep 2024 11:03:00 -0400 Childhood adversity linked to elevated health risks, differing by sex and stress
有前景的抗抑郁药为胶质母细胞瘤治疗带来希望胶质母细胞瘤是一种特别具有侵袭性的脑肿瘤，目前无法治愈。癌症医生可以通过手术、放疗、化疗或手术干预来延长患者的预期寿命。然而，一半的患者在诊断后十二个月内死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/Promising-antidepressant-offers-hope-for-glioblastoma-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/Promising-antidepressant-offers-hope-for-glioblastoma-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad5c3245-16cd-4b00-aee2-65454f7b394a Fri, 20 Sep 2024 08:21:00 -0400 Promising antidepressant offers hope for glioblastoma treatment
新的血液测试可识别儿童与肥胖相关的健康风险科学家表示，一种使用脂质的新型血液测试可以更容易地识别存在肥胖并发症风险的儿童，包括二型糖尿病、肝脏疾病和心脏病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/New-blood-test-identizes-obesity-lated-health-risks-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/New-blood-test-identizes-obesity-lated-health-risks-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b3c731d-8d33-4c67-b3cb-0bf1e5a1bf5a Fri, 20 Sep 2024 07:50:36 -0400 New blood test identifies obesity-related health risks in children
北卡罗来纳州农村县将在新联邦计划的帮助下重新开放已关闭的医院八月中旬的一个早晨，克里斯托弗·哈里森站在已关闭的马丁综合医院前，回忆起一年前的一天，当时他拍下了工人们遮盖医院标志的照片。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/Rural-NC-county-is-set-to-reopen-its-shuttered-hospital-with-help-from-a-new-federal-program。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/Rural-NC-county-is-set-to-reopen-its-shuttered-hospital-with-help-from-a-new-federal-program。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e9aed94-844b-4978-995b-55127d8cf836 Fri, 20 Sep 2024 06:38:58 -0400 Rural NC county is set to reopen its shuttered hospital with help from a new federal program
通过奖学金解决人员短缺问题，加州法案旨在加强精神健康法庭一项看似无伤大雅的提议，为加利福尼亚州新的法院下令的治疗计划中的精神卫生工作者提供奖学金，引发了关于该州是否应该优先考虑该计划或解决行为健康服务中更广泛的劳动力短缺问题的争论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/Fighting-staff-shortages-with-scholarships-California-bill-aims-to-boost-mental-health-courts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/Fighting-staff-shortages-with-scholarships-California-bill-aims-to-boost-mental-health-courts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3dd4640e-97d1-4d3e-b3a0-bec9e0bc82b9 Fri, 20 Sep 2024 06:37:06 -0400 Fighting staff shortages with scholarships, California bill aims to boost mental health courts
analytica 将其国际网络扩展到美国analytica 正在扩大其国际网络，并将于 2025 年秋季在俄亥俄州哥伦布市推出 analytica USA，以覆盖北美市场。世界领先的实验室技术、分析和生物技术贸易展览会的新分支将于 9 月 10 日至 12 日在大哥伦布会议中心举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/analytica-expands-its-international-network-to-the-USA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/analytica-expands-its-international-network-to-the-USA.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c735f9a0-a913-4695-8450-26f78487792c Fri, 20 Sep 2024 06:17:00 -0400 analytica expands its international network to the USA
Nagi Bioscience 推出独家优先访问计划，为五个领先的学术实验室带来革命性的 SydLab™ One 平台，用于线虫研究Nagi Bioscience 是替代模式生物研究尖端实验室技术领域的瑞士先驱公司，自豪地宣布启动其独家优先访问计划，为五个领先的学术实验室提供首个 SydLab™ One 的使用权平台。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/Nagi-Bioscience-launches-exclusive-Priority-Access-Program-bringing-revolutionary-SydLabe284a2-One-platform-to- Five-leading-academic-labs- for-C-elegans-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/Nagi-Bioscience-launches-exclusive-Priority-Access-Program-bringing-revolutionary-SydLabe284a2-One-platform-to- Five-leading-academic-labs- for-C-elegans-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ddacdec9-d004-49eb-8265-f68c5fc38184 Fri, 20 Sep 2024 01:24:00 -0400 Nagi Bioscience launches exclusive Priority Access Program, bringing revolutionary SydLab™ One platform to five leading academic labs for C. elegans research
β 淀粉样蛋白和 tau 蛋白会扰乱大脑活动，导致早期认知能力下降，增加阿尔茨海默病风险研究人员发现，β-淀粉样蛋白和 tau 蛋白病理学如何相互作用，驱动有阿尔茨海默病风险的老年人的早期神经生理学变化和认知能力下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/Amyloid-ceb2-and-tau-disrupt-brain-activity-driven-early-cognitive-decline-in-Alzheimere28099s-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/Amyloid-ceb2-and-tau-disrupt-brain-activity-driven-early-cognitive-decline-in-Alzheimere28099s-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1dd0df20-ad0d-449f-aceb-0c63e167b575 Fri, 20 Sep 2024 01:01:00 -0400 Amyloid-β and tau disrupt brain activity, driving early cognitive decline in Alzheimer’s risk
龙沙提名胡安·安德烈斯和埃里克·德拉佩为独立董事会成员今天，龙沙董事会宣布提名胡安·安德烈斯和埃里克·德拉佩为董事会独立成员。董事会将在 2025 年 5 月召开的龙沙集团年度股东大会 (AGM) 上向股东提议选举两名提名人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/Lonza-nominates-Juan-Andres-and-Eric-Drape-as-independent-Board-Members.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240920/Lonza-nominates-Juan-Andres-and-Eric-Drape-as-independent-Board-Members.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d7e70f4-112a-4b16-b847-bf3de57e31e4 Fri, 20 Sep 2024 00:53:00 -0400 Lonza nominates Juan Andres and Eric Drapé as independent Board Members
